#!/bin/bash
mkdir -p /mnt/server/
cd /mnt/server

# Install steamcmd
mkdir -p steamcmd
wget https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd_linux.tar.gz -C steamcmd
rm steamcmd_linux.tar.gz

# Permissions
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

# Setup libraries
mkdir -p .steam/sdk32
mkdir -p .steam/sdk64
cp -v steamcmd/linux32/steamclient.so .steam/sdk32/steamclient.so
cp -v steamcmd/linux64/steamclient.so .steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

# Install SCP: SL Dedicated Server

./steamcmd/steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 996560 validate +quit

# Install EXILED
wget https://github.com/Exiled-Team/EXILED/releases/download/2.8.0/Exiled.Installer-Linux
chmod +x Exiled.Installer-Linux
./Exiled.Installer-Linux --path /mnt/server --exit
rm Exiled.Installer-Linux
